page.title: 05LIFE STYLES, LYNEMOUTH.
page.content: {Morning.}( Claire Linsley ) I get up at eight o'clock,get washed and dressed and go downstairs for breakfast. I usually have cereal. I get my hair brushed and take my dog for a walk to the Welfare. I go to the shops with my Mam before I come to school. {School. School starts at nine o'clock. The first thing we do is have assembly followed by Maths or English or P.E. At lO.3O. we go for our playtime. After play we write stories and learn spellings. At ll.55. we wash our hands and go for lunch. Usually we have potatoes, meat and turnip and for pudding we have fruit crumble and custard. After dinner we sometimes have Art and Craft, Topic, Music or P.E. I enjoy P.E. particularly when we have
